'''''I Ask of Thee, Art Thou Mankind?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category [[Wonders of the World]]. To complete the achievement, the player needs to pick up a [[Mysterious Grimoire]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the light novel series ''{{w|The Mystic Archives of Dantalian}}''.
